subject: RE: [junit] Websphere Connection Pool
msgSnippet: ...  This developer works article explains it quite well: It s called Unit testing with mock objects http://tinyurl.com/4ukc Regards Chris =====
messageBody:
<snip>
> how to I test connections to the db, and objects
> which use the db
> connections without having to run the websphere
> server?
<snip>

This developer works article explains it quite well:
It's called "Unit testing with mock objects"
http://tinyurl.com/4ukc

Regards
Chris
